name: Ext_R5_DiagnosticReport_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DiagnosticReport.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents DiagnosticReport.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DiagnosticReport|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: registered | partial | preliminary | modified | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The status of the diagnostic report.
element.comment: `DiagnosticReport.status` maps to R4 `DiagnosticReport.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.short: registered | partial | preliminary | modified | final | amended | corrected | appended | cancelled | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The status of the diagnostic report.
element.comment: `DiagnosticReport.status` maps to R4 `DiagnosticReport.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: The status of the diagnostic report.
